title: Bug 134949Themes nest in other library
description: Details:Themes nest in other libraryStep:1. Library A use LibraryB, and Library B has a themes2. Report design use Library A3. I open the Library tree of A in library explorer and drop the themes from B into layout.Actual result:It pop up an error message and said that the library namespace "B" exists already.Exception result:I don't konw if I can use by this method. But I think it is a method user may be used.
